name: nexs-mcp-app
description: MCP App that renders live, interactive NExS spreadsheets inside Claude Web

scripts.build: tsc --noEmit && tsc -p tsconfig.server.json && cross-env INPUT=spreadsheet.html vite build
scripts.start: concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=development INPUT=spreadsheet.html vite build --watch" "tsx watch main.ts"
